name: DatePicker.Root
description: A component that allows users to select a date from a calendar.
description_zh: A component that allows users to select a date from a calendar.

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

closeOnSelect.description:
Whether the calendar should close after the date selection is complete.
This is ignored when the selection mode is `multiple`.
closeOnSelect.description_zh:
日期选择完成后是否应关闭日历。
当选择模式为 'multiple' 时，将忽略此项。

defaultOpen.description:
The initial open state of the date picker when it is first rendered.
Use when you do not need to control its open state.
defaultOpen.description_zh:
首次呈现日期选取器时的初始打开状态。
在不需要控制其打开状态时使用。

defaultValue.description:
The initial value of the date picker when it is first rendered.
Use when you do not need to control the state of the date picker.
defaultValue.description_zh:
首次呈现日期选取器时的初始值。
在不需要控制日期选取器的状态时使用。

disabled.description_zh: 日历是否处于禁用状态。

fixedWeeks.description:
Whether the calendar should have a fixed number of weeks.
This renders the calendar with 6 weeks instead of 5 or 6.
fixedWeeks.description_zh:
日历是否应具有固定的周数。
这将使用 6 周而不是 5 或 6 周来呈现日历。

format.description: The format of the date to display in the input.
format.description_zh: 要在输入中显示的日期的格式。

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type: Partial<{ root: string; label(index: number): string; table(id: string): string; tableHeader(id: string): string; tableBody(id: string): string; tableRow(id: string): string; content: string; ... 10 more ...; positioner: string; }>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the date picker. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: 日期选取器中元素的 ID。对合成很有用。

isDateUnavailable.description: Returns whether a date of the calendar is available.
isDateUnavailable.description_zh: 返回日历的日期是否可用。

locale.description: The locale (BCP 47 language tag) to use when formatting the date.
locale.description_zh: 设置日期格式时要使用的区域设置（BCP 47 语言标签）。

max.description: The maximum date that can be selected.

min.description: The minimum date that can be selected.

modal.description:
Whether the calendar should be modal. This means that the calendar will
block interaction with the rest of the page, and trap focus within it.
modal.description_zh:
日历是否应为模态日历。这意味着日历将
阻止与页面其余部分的交互，并在其中捕获焦点。

modelValue.description: The v-model value of the date picker
modelValue.description_zh: 日期选取器的 v-model 值

name.description: The `name` attribute of the input element.

numOfMonths.description: The number of months to display.

positioning.description: The user provided options used to position the date picker content
positioning.description_zh: 用户提供的用于定位日期选取器内容的选项

selectionMode.description:
The selection mode of the calendar.
- `single` - only one date can be selected
- `multiple` - multiple dates can be selected
- `range` - a range of dates can be selected
selectionMode.description_zh:
日历的选择模式。
- 'single' - 只能选择一个日期
- 'multiple' - 可以选择多个日期
- 'range' - 可以选择日期范围

startOfWeek.description:
The first day of the week.
 `0` - Sunday
 `1` - Monday
 `2` - Tuesday
 `3` - Wednesday
 `4` - Thursday
 `5` - Friday
 `6` - Saturday
startOfWeek.description_zh:
一周的第一天。
 '0' - 星期日
 '1' - 星期一
 '2' - 星期二
 '3' - 星期三
 '4' - 星期四
 '5' - 星期五
 '6' - 周六

events.name: focusChange
events.description: Function called when the focused date changes.
events.description_zh: 当聚焦日期更改时调用的函数。

events.name: openChange
events.description: Function called when the calendar opens or closes.
events.description_zh: 日历打开或关闭时调用的函数。

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: The callback fired when the model value changes.
events.description_zh: 当 model 值更改时触发回调。

events.name: valueChange
events.description: Function called when the value changes.

events.name: viewChange
events.description: Function called when the view changes.
events.description_zh: 视图更改时调用的函数。
